manifestAppDesc.message: Language Learning with Netflix extension (LLN) & Language Learning with YouTube (LLY)

appDesc.message: Language Learning with Netflix extension makes your life a lot easier, and more fun

disableTestModeDescription.message:
Netflix sometimes runs tests that can cause Language Learning with Netflix not to work properly. To avoid issues,we
recommend that you turn off Netflix test participation. It's easy:

anyProblemInFunctionality.message: Any problem in the functionality of this extension can be solved with a simple refresh

saveWordMeaning.message: You can save the meaning of any word by right-clicking on it

howToChangeSubtitles.message: How to change the language of subtitles

hoverMouseOnSubtitle.message: Hover the mouse on the original subtitles

clickAnyWordOnThe.message: Just click on any word of the original subtitles, then click on the

clickOnLanguageTab.message: Click on the setting icon, then click on the language tab to find the appropriate selector

signAtTheEndOfSentence.message: sign at the end of any sentence that you like

atTheBottomOfPlayer.message: at the bottom of the player, then click on the download file button to download the text file

clickOnAnyWordOfOriginalSubtitles.message: Just click on any word of the original subtitles

clickToSelectUpperSubtitles.message: Click to Select the UPPER Subtitles

clickToSelectLowerSubtitles.message: Click to Select the LOWER Subtitles

autoStopAfterTime.message: Auto Stop and Start after Time

autoStopWithSpace.message: Auto Stop and Start with Space

beGenerousUser.message: You can be a generous user by writing a review here. Thanks!

youCanChangeLanguageYoutube.message: You can change this language on the settings of video

youCanChangeLanguageExtensionSetting.message: You can change this language on the settings of the extension

toUseShortcuts.message: To use, first activate the shortcuts from the settings

upgradeYourAccount.message: Upgrade  your account to use Machine Translation!

toAccessMachineTranslations.message: to access machine translations for all movies

toEnableDisablePhoneticLanguages.message: To enable/disable phonetic for Korean, Japanese, Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese languages go to setting or click the button below!

loginToDownloadSubtitle.message: Log in to download subtitle file!

getYourTrialForDownloadingSubtitles.message: You have reached your daily limits for downloading subtitles. Get your FREE trial to downloading more subtitles!

thisVideoHasNoSubtitles.message: Ooooops! This video has no subtitles!

loginToLearnPronunciation.message: Log in to learn the exact pronunciation of each word

youReachedYourDailySavedWordsLimit.message: You have reached your daily limits for saving words. Get your FREE trial to learning an unlimited number of words
